price: 11 qui hériteront les hauts lieux du Paradis où ils demeureront pour l’éternité.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
